Key Match Events: Holmgren rocks the rim with thunderous jam
SGA's layup extends OKC's lead in the 4th
Jalen Williams throws down emphatic jam
Westbrook dishes to Murray for a corner 3
Christian Braun glides in for a dunk
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 28 points, Chet Holmgren added 25 as part of a stellar all-around performance and the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Denver Nuggets 102-87 on Thursday night in the season opener for both teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gilgeous-Alexander, Holmgren lead Thunder to 102-87 win over Nuggets in season opener
Game Leaders: Points: S. Gilgeous-Alexander#2 - OKC 28
Game Leaders: Rebounds: C. Holmgren#7 - OKC 14
Game Leaders: Assists: S. Gilgeous-Alexander#2 - OKC 8
Others: Referees: J.T. Orr, Kevin Scott, Danielle Scott
